meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the January 8, 2024 Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Public Safety Recruiting and Retention Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the recruiting and retention efforts for public safety personnel.

agenda_items.title: Violent Crime Reduction Plan Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the strategies and progress of the violent crime reduction plan.

agenda_items.title: Overview of the Enhancements to the Sexual Assault Investigation Process
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the improvements made to the sexual assault investigation process.
agenda_items.presenter: Catrina Shead, Assistant Chief, Investigation Bureau, Dallas Police Department

agenda_items.title: Overview of Dallas Fire- Rescue Blood Transfusion Pilot Program
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the pilot program for blood transfusions in Dallas Fire-Rescue.
agenda_items.presenter: Scott Clumpner, Deputy Chief, Dallas Fire Rescue Department, Dr. Marshal Isaacs, Chief Medical Director, Courtney Edwards, Director of Parkland Hospital

agenda_items.title: Overview of Public Safety Technology Projects

agenda_items.title: Police Academy Update

agenda_items.title: February 14, 2024 City Council Agenda Item #6; 24-79
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 7A, 'Anti-Litter Regulations,' of the Dallas City Code.

agenda_items.title: February 14, 2024 City Council Agenda Item #30; 24-456
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year cooperative purchasing agreement for a mobile forensic software subscription for the Police Department.

financial_items.description: Authorize a three-year cooperative purchasing agreement for a mobile forensic software subscription for the Police Department.
Providing a penalty not to exceed for anti-litter regulations.
